product_name: Yakima Control Tower Landing Pad - #6, #7 and #11
long_description: Landing Pads are the other part of the Control Tower system, made to fit a range of "other" vehicle applications. Landing Pads #6 bolt onto just about any surface: truck caps, tent trailers, RVs and boats. Landing Pads #11 are designed to fit on many different factory mounting points. Attachment to Control Towers (sold separately) is quick and easy. Custom-sized to distribute load evenly; custom pads offer great protection. Seal tight to keep water out. Long-lasting, stainless-steel hardware. Set of 2 for Landing Pads 6 and 11; set of 4 for Landing Pad 12 and 13.
short_description: Landing Pads are the other part of the Control Tower system, made to fit a range of "other" vehicle applications.
